Docs.remarks: The extension methods below make it easier to use Vector types.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector2d AddSub (this Mono.Simd.Vector2d v1, Mono.Simd.Vector2d v2);
public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f AddSub (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1, Mono.Simd.Vector4f v2);

Docs.summary: Computes (v1.X - v2.X, v1.Y + v2.Y, v1.Z - v2.Z, v1.W + v2.W).
Docs.remarks: Computes (v1.X - v2.X, v1.Y + v2.Y, v1.Z - v2.Z, v1.W + v2.W).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector16b AddWithSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector16b va, Mono.Simd.Vector16b vb);

Docs.returns: The unsigned saturated addition of two vectors.

remarks.para: The resulting vector contains the unsigned saturated sum of the individual components of the vector.
If the sum of two of the components would overflow, then the result of the saturated sum is Byte.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector16sb AddWithSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector16sb va, Mono.Simd.Vector16sb vb);

Docs.returns: The signed saturated addition of two vectors.

remarks.para: The resulting vector contains the signed saturated sum of the individual components of the vector.
If the sum of two of the components would overflow, then the result of the saturated sum is SByte.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector8s AddWithSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector8s va, Mono.Simd.Vector8s vb);

Docs.returns: The signed saturated addition of two vectors.

remarks.para: The resulting vector contains the signed saturated sum of the individual components of the vector.
If the sum of two of the components would overflow, then the result of the saturated sum is Short.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector8us AddWithSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector8us va, Mono.Simd.Vector8us vb);

Docs.returns: The unsigned saturated addition of two vectors.

remarks.para: The resulting vector contains the unsigned saturated sum of the individual components of the vector.
If the sum of two of the components would overflow, then the result of the saturated sum is UShort.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector2d AndNot (this Mono.Simd.Vector2d v1, Mono.Simd.Vector2d v2);

Docs.summary: Compares the elements of two vectors for equality.
Docs.returns: A new vector with the comparison results.
Docs.remarks: Equal components get all their bits set to 1; Unequal components gets the value set to zero. You can cast the result into a Vector2ul and compare the integer properties to UInt64.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f AndNot (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1, Mono.Simd.Vector4f v2);

Docs.summary: Compares the elements of two vectors for equality.
Docs.returns: A new vector with the comparison results.
Docs.remarks: Equal components get all their bits set to 1; Unequal components gets the value set to zero. You can cast the result into a Vector4ui and compare the integer properties to UInt64.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4ui ArithmeticRightShift (this Mono.Simd.Vector4ui v1, int amount);

Docs.summary: Do an arithmetic right shift on each vector element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector8us ArithmeticRightShift (this Mono.Simd.Vector8us va, int amount);

Docs.summary: Do an arithmetic right shift on each vector element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector16b Average (this Mono.Simd.Vector16b va, Mono.Simd.Vector16b vb);

Docs.summary: Average each vector element using (a + b + 1) / 2.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector8us Average (this Mono.Simd.Vector8us va, Mono.Simd.Vector8us vb);

Docs.summary: Average each vector element using (a + b + 1) / 2.

Docs.summary: Returns a vector with values (v1.X, v1.X).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f DuplicateHigh (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1);

Docs.summary: Returns a vector with values (v1.Y, v1.Y, v1.W, v1.W).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f DuplicateLow (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1);

Docs.summary: Returns a vector with values (v1.X, v1.X, v1.Z, v1.Z).

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ExtractByteMask (this Mono.Simd.Vector16b va);

Docs.summary: Calculates an integer mask where each bit is set if the high bit of the corresponding element is.
Docs.remarks: Sets bit 0 of the result if va.X & 0x80 is true, bit 1 if va.Y & 0x80 is true and so on.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ExtractByteMask (this Mono.Simd.Vector16sb va);

Docs.summary: Calculates an integer mask where each bit is set if the high bit of the corresponding element is.
Docs.remarks: Sets bit 0 of the result if va.X & 0x80 is true, bit 1 if va.Y & 0x80 is true and so on.

public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f HorizontalAdd (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1, Mono.Simd.Vector4f v2);

Docs.summary: Returns (v1.x + v1.y, v1.z + v1.w, v2.x + v2.y, v2.z + v2.w).

Docs.summary: Return (v1.x - v1.y, v1.z - v1.w, v2.x - v2.y, v2.z - v2.w).

Docs.summary: Pack the first the elements from va then vb performing signed saturation.
Docs.remarks: Values below Short.MinValue are changed to Short.MinValue and values above Short.MaxValue are changed to Short.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector16sb PackWithSignedSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector8s va, Mono.Simd.Vector8s vb);

Docs.summary: Pack the first the elements from va then vb performing signed saturation.
Docs.remarks: Values below SByte.MinValue are changed to SByte.MinValue and values above SByte.MaxValue are changed to SByte.MaxValue.

Docs.summary: Pack the first the elements from va then vb performing unsigned saturation.
Docs.remarks: Values above UShort.MaxValue are changed to UShort.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector16b PackWithUnsignedSaturation (this Mono.Simd.Vector8s va, Mono.Simd.Vector8s vb);

Docs.summary: Pack the first the elements from va then vb performing unsigned saturation.
Docs.remarks: Values above Byte.MaxValue are changed to Byte.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f Reciprocal (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1);
public static Mono.Simd.Vector4f Shuffle (this Mono.Simd.Vector4f v1, Mono.Simd.ShuffleSel sel);

Docs.summary: Return a vector based on the ShuffleSel mask.
Docs.remarks: Each of the four elements are chosen from the source vector based on the value of ShuffleSel. The selector must be a compile time constant or the runtime won't accelerate it

MemberSignature.Value: public static Mono.Simd.Vector4i Shuffle (this Mono.Simd.Vector4i v1, Mono.Simd.ShuffleSel sel);

Docs.summary: Return a vector based on the ShuffleSel mask.

Docs.returns: The unsigned saturated subtraction of two vectors.

remarks.para: The resulting vector contains the unsigned saturated subtraction of the individual components of the vector.
If the subtraction of two of the components would be negative, then the result is zero.

Docs.returns: The unsigned saturated subtraction of two vectors.

If the subtraction of two of the components would undeflow, then the result is SByte.MinValue.
